Another recommendation could be "The Trouble with Harry". This classic horror film tells the story of a group of people who are stranded on an island that is haunted by a mysterious creature. The group must work together to survive on the island, and also confront the terrifying creatures that haunt them every night.
Finally, another recommendation could be "Witless Protection." This action comedy follows the daily grind of a small-town sheriff who witnesses what he believes to be an attempted kidnapping. He then embarks on his own investigation to find out what really happened that day. And along with his investigation, he must also work together with his small crew to survive and make their way back home safely.
In conclusion, based on the provided preferences, I would recommend watching "End of Watch."

Uptown Girls is another comedy movie about a grown- up woman who kept her childish instincts and behavior starts working as the nanny of an 8- year- old girl who actually acts like an adult. But everything ends right- side up. The movie stars Frances Bavier, Paul Fix.

The movie has a great cast, including Ella Joyce, Blair Underwood, Blair Underwood, Jada Pinkett Smith, Jada Pinkett Smith, Dr. Dre, Vivica A. Fox, Vivica A. Fox, Kimberly Elise. "Heart of Darkness" is a classic novel by Joseph Conrad that tells the story of a British merchant captain named Charles Marlow who goes to Africa in 1890 to establish a trading post with local tribes and to buy ivory tusks from them. While he is there, he meets two other men who are working as porters for the trading post. One of these men, named Kurtz, becomes very interested in the life of the people living around the trading post and begins to take on many of their responsibilities, including providing protection and security for the people living around the trading post, overseeing their basic needs such as food and clothing, managing their collective resources such as labor and capital, and providing guidance and direction for the future development and growth of the community.
